newsitem.title: USA: China Tire says venture unit dissolved.
newsitem.headline: China Tire says venture unit dissolved.

text.p: China Tire Holdings Ltd said Thursday the dissolution of its Dalian C.S.I. Rubber Co Ltd has been approved by the Dalian municipal government.

Dalian C.S.I., which is a 70 percent operating subsidiary of China Tire, is a venture formed by a wholly owned subsidiary of China Tire and Dalian Rubber Factory. China Tire said the main investment was in Dalian International Nordic Tire Co Ltd.
The venture became a matter of dispute between the two partners in the courts after Dalian Rubber decided to pull its investment, China Tire said.

China Tire said that Dalian C.S.I. management decided it was no longer economically feasible to continue the operation. Dalian C.S.I. has formed a committee to look after the liquidiation of the joint venture assets.
